entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Southwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Low. Changes: The chance of upgrade for this Watch has been decreased to Low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

entry.summary: Northerly winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain, and amounts may approach warning criteria. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain with thunderstorms possible, and amounts may approach warning criteria. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Low. Changes: The chance of upgrade for this Watch has been decreased to Low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain, with thunderstorms possible. Amounts may approach warning criteria. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Low. Changes: The chance of upgrade for this Watch has been decreased to Low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain with thunderstorms possible. Rainfall amounts may approach warning criteria within 15 km east of the main divide. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Low. Changes: The chance of upgrade for this Watch has been decreased to Low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Severe Thunderstorm Warning
entry.summary:
At 03:22 pm, MetService weather radar detected severe thunderstorms near HELENSVILLE, OFFSHORE AUCKLAND WEST COAST, KAUKAPAKAPA, WOODHILL, MURIWAI BEACH, PARAKAI, SOUTH HEAD, OKAHUKURA PENINSULA, KAIPARA HEAD, AUCKLAND, HENDERSON, MANUKAU HEADS and PIHA.
These severe thunderstorms are moving towards the southeast, and are expected to lie near AUCKLAND, AUCKLAND CITY, MANUKAU HEADS, AWHITU, HELENSVILLE, KAUKAPAKAPA, WOODHILL, PARAKAI, WAIMAUKU, MANUKAU, SOUTH AUCKLAND and AUCKLAND AIRPORT at 03:52 pm and near PUKEKOHE, POKENO, TUAKAU, HUNUA, PORT WAIKATO, DRURY, BOMBAY, MERCER, TE KOHANGA, ONEWHERO, THE HUNUA RANGES, ARARIMU, AUCKLAND, AUCKLAND CITY, SOUTH AUCKLAND, AUCKLAND AIRPORT and PAPAKURA at 04:22 pm.
These thunderstorms are expected to be accompanied by very heavy rain.
Impact:
Very heavy rain can cause surface and/or flash flooding about streams, gullies and urban areas, and make driving conditions extremely hazardous.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited
